lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did God create on day one?
answers: The heavens and the earth and light

questions.text: What did God create on day two?
answers: He separated the sky and the sea

questions.text: What did God create on day three?
What did God create on day four?
What did God create on day five?
What did God create on day six?
How are human beings different than everything else God made?
answers: We’re made in His likeness and given the job to rule over His creation
We can swim and fly better than all animals
We were created before light and water
We live under the sea like fish

questions.text: What did God create on day seven?

answers: Out of nothing, just by speaking
By asking the angels to build it
By finding pieces that were already there

questions.text: What did God say after seeing everything He made?
answers: It needed to be fixed later
He wasn’t sure He liked it
